hero.name: Gabriel Caetano
hero.title: Full Stack Developer | AI & LLM Specialist
hero.introduction: Software Engineering student at UniCesumar with a strong analytical background from the finance sector. I focus on building scalable full-stack applications, merging the efficiency of the JavaScript ecosystem (React, Node.js, TypeScript) with the innovation of Artificial Intelligence (RAG/LLMs). I strive to turn technical challenges into solutions that deliver real-world impact.
hero.skillsIntro: Technologies I use to build modern, high-performance digital products.

metrics.title: Impact & Results
metrics.perfDesc: Search and filter optimization on the SBR Imóveis platform.
metrics.autoDesc: Reduction of manual operations in the Salon App via AI integration.
metrics.timeDesc: Administrative time savings on the Uneagro portal.

ai_showcase.title: AI Architecture: RAG Specialist
ai_showcase.subtitle: Not just prompts. I build the infrastructure that makes AI accurate and business-integrated.
ai_showcase.step1Desc: Extraction and cleaning of raw data (schedules and preferences).
ai_showcase.step2Desc: Conversion of text into vectors for semantic search.
ai_showcase.step3Desc: Real-time context retrieval for the prompt.
ai_showcase.step4Desc: Generation of accurate and personalized responses.

experience.title: Professional Journey
experience.eduDesc: Focus on system architecture and full-stack development at UniCesumar.
experience.devDesc: Developing AI solutions and performance optimization.
experience.finDesc: Analytical vision and process management at Construtora Planespaço.
